text: Herds will lie down in the middle of the city. It will become the home for every kind of wild animal. Eagle owls and screech owls2:14. The actual birds mentioned here are uncertain, but are listed in Leviticus and Deuteronomy as unclean.  will roost on its columns. Their calls will echo through the windows. Rubble will block the doors, and the cedar woodwork will be exposed.
